code: import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:typeof process!=='undefined'&&process.env&&process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api'});export const getProjects=async()=>{const{data}=await api.get('/projects');return data;};export const getProjectById=async id=>{const{data}=await api.get("/projects/".concat(id));return data;};export const createProject=async payload=>{const{data}=await api.post('/projects',payload);return data;};
